Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Pyromaniac:





Shockwave did a quick few maneuvers, launching off two missiles from his 
launcher, one at Hot Rod and one at Forrior.  He received Rainchark's 
transmission and opened a comm. link with him.  "We are still in a position 
to cause damage to the enemy.  The Decepticons shall withdraw soon when the 
battle becomes strategically unsound." the Emperor intoned.

Unitron's scanners read a great deal of weapons fire coming towards him so he 
transformed to his biped mode, leaping into the air, the boosters in his feet 
rocketing into the air, the laser blasts and the ice beams missing, as well 
as the missiles, but the resulting explosions sent him flying high, and 
crashing down into the ground.

Firestarter transformed into his biped mode, smaller now then he was in his 
space fighter mode.  Using the boosters in his feet he was able to continue 
flying, dodging the shots that had been shot at him.

He raised his flame cannon, firing off three fireballs at Cledar.

The only space fighter of the NDE in the air, Sixshot, avoided both missiles 
and the pot shots easily, mocking them in his mind.  He fired off twenty-five 
laser bolts from his nosecone, five at Rixer, five at Blyer, and fifteen at 
Firearm.
